sentences.english: City Northeast Thousand Buddha Caves, cultural and natural landscape of two-phase of its America.
sentences.chinese: 城东北有千佛洞，人文与自然景观两相其美。

sentences.english: Just a few kilometers further along this range are the famous Bezeklik Caves.
sentences.chinese: 沿着火焰山前进几公里就是著名的柏孜克里千佛洞。

sentences.english: This weekend, o son of a thousand Buddha caves "."
sentences.chinese: 周末，阿中领着儿子游览“千佛洞”。

sentences.english: The Dunhuang Mogao Grottoes or Caves of One Thousand Buddhas is one of the three famous grottoes in China.
sentences.chinese: 敦煌莫高窟，俗称千佛洞，是中国三大宝窟之一。

definition: rock cave/grotto/cliff caves (often with Buddhist statues)
